tarot_suits.description: The suit of Wands represents creativity, passion, and energy. It is associated with action, ambition, and making plans for the future.
The suit of Cups is related to emotions, relationships, and connections. It signifies love, intuition, and the depth of feelings.
The suit of Swords symbolizes intellect, thoughts, and communication. It deals with challenges, conflicts, and the power of the mind.
The suit of Pentacles represents material aspects, such as money, career, and possessions. It focuses on practicality, security, and the physical world.
